SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'FR' AND city = 'Paris' AND spa = 1 AND wifi = 'free';
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'HU' AND stars >= 5 AND fitness_center = 1 AND bar = 1 AND adults_only = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'GB' AND city = 'London' AND parking IN ('free', 'surcharge') AND fitness_center = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'AT' AND spa = 1 AND fitness_center = 1 AND increased_accessibility = 1 AND unit_wheelchair_accessible = 1 AND restaurant = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'NL' AND fitness_center = 1 AND spa = 1 AND restaurant = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'CZ' AND city = 'Prague' AND spa = 1 AND restaurant = 1 AND (cribs = 1 OR kids_friendly_buffet = 1 OR playground = 1);
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'IT' AND stars >= 4.5 AND spa = 1 AND sauna = 1 AND steam_room = 1 AND fitness_center = 1 AND restaurant = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Porto' AND fitness_center = 1 AND spa = 1 AND kids_friendly_buffet = 0 AND child_pool = 0 AND playground = 0;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'ES' AND city = 'Barcelona' AND restaurant = 1 AND fitness_center = 1 AND spa = 1 AND lat BETWEEN 41.1 AND 41.7 AND lon BETWEEN 1.8 AND 2.9;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'IT' AND city = 'Rome' AND fitness_center = 1 AND spa = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'TR' AND city = 'Istanbul' AND spa = 1 AND fitness_center = 1 AND ocean_view = 1 AND stars >= 5;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Amsterdam' AND fitness_center = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'ES' AND city = 'Madrid' AND spa = 1 AND wifi = 'free' AND pool = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'FR' AND stars >= 5 AND spa = 1 AND fitness_center = 1 AND restaurant = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'DK' AND city = 'Copenhagen' AND increased_accessibility = 1 AND restaurant = 1 AND fitness_center = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'AT' AND city = 'Vienna' AND stars >= 4.5 AND fitness_center = 1 AND spa = 1 AND restaurant = 1 AND rating >= 9 AND review_count >= 50;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'GR' AND city = 'Corfu' AND rating >= 8 AND review_count >= 20 AND pool = 1 AND (ocean_view = 1 OR increased_accessibility = 1) AND spa = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'IT' AND stars >= 4 AND ocean_view = 1 AND spa = 1 AND fitness_center = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'DK' AND city = 'Copenhagen' AND (pool = 1 OR beach_access IN ('private beach', 'beach access')) AND playground = 1 AND stars <= 3;
